name: Barbara RUGGIANO v. The MIRIAM HOSPITAL et al.

parties: Barbara RUGGIANO v. The MIRIAM HOSPITAL et al.

opinions.text:
ORDER
The defendants’ motion to affirm the judgment of the Superior Court pursuant to Rule 16(g) is granted.

attorneys: John F. McBurney, Pawtucket, for plaintiff.
Roberts, Carroll, Feldstein & Tucker, David W. Carroll, Providence, for defendants.
casebody.head_matter:
Barbara RUGGIANO v. The MIRIAM HOSPITAL et al.
No. 82-278-A.
Supreme Court of Rhode Island.
Jan. 6, 1983.
John F. McBurney, Pawtucket, for plaintiff.
Roberts, Carroll, Feldstein & Tucker, David W. Carroll, Providence, for defendants.
